English: to take away, take off; photograph
to take off, to photograph, to rent
to come in, drop in, visit
to protrude, stick out, hang about
to gather, collect, put together, pack
to turn (as in "turn one's eyes upon smth"), turn into
to get in, to push, butt in
to be at war, to fight
to light up, begin to smoke
to bring down, fall heavily (of snow)
to take out, lead out, remove, grow
